# Helper Library

[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](LICENSE) [![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/pyhelper-tools-jbhm?style=for-the-badge&label=PyPI&color=blue)](https://pypi.org/project/pyhelper-tools-jbhm/)

## üåç Teny misy

Pyhelper dia manolotra fandikan-teny namboarina ho an'ny teny hatramin'ny ** 131 fiteny ** ao anatin'izany:

---


## üöÄ Fametrahana

Apetraho avy amin'ny Pypi:

```bash
pip install pyhelper-tools-jbhm
```

---

## üìñ Overview

** pyhelper ** dia fitaovana iray versatile Python natao hanatsorana  
Mampifangaro ny seamlessly amin'ny akademika, fikarohana ary tetikasa matihanina, mamela anao hifantoka amin'ny saina fa tsy ny kaody boilerplate.

Tombanana fototra:
- üßÆ üßÆ naorina - statistika sy statistika sy matematika **
- üìä Easy-to-fampiasana mora ampiasaina ** Wrappers ** 
- üóÇ Hendry ** Fandraisana sy fitadiavana ** 
- üîç ** Fanamarinana syntax ** ho an'ny rakitra Python
- üåç ** Fanohanana marobe ** miaraka amin'ny fandikana vonona
- üöÄ optimized ho an'ny ** Fast Prototyping ** sy ** Fanabeazana ** 

---

## ‚ú® endri-javatra fototra

### üìä Visualization data
- Saripika Bar: Horizontal & Vertical (`hbar`, `vbar`)  
- Famantaran'ny fizarana: histograms (`histo`), boaty boaty (`boxplot`), kde plots (`kdeplot`)  
- Plots fampitahana: violin, swarm, strip plots  
- famakafakana fanitsiana: Heatmaps (`heatmap`), miparitaka plots (`scatter`)  
- Visualations Advanced: Pair Plots, plots mpiara-miasa, famerenan'ny famerenam-bokatra  
- Tabatasy data: fampisehoana latabatra namboarina (`table`)  

### üìà Analysis statistika
- ** Ny fironana afovoany ** : Mean (`get_media`), median (`get_median`), mode (`get_moda`)  
- ** Dispersion ** : Range (`get_rank`), variance (`get_var`), fenitra fenitra (`get_desv`)  
- ** famakafakana ** : tatitra momba ny fanaparitahana (`disp`), kajy iqr, fanavaozana, fanavaozana fepetra  
- ** Fikarohana haingana ** : IQR sy Z-Score fomba  

### üóÇÔ∏è Fitantanana rakitra
- Fahatsiarovana Smart miaraka amin'ny `call()` (auto-detect CSV, JSON, XML, etc.)  
- Fanohanana marobe amin'ny endrika (CSV, JSON, XML, PDF, spatial data)  
- Ny fitantanana ny Database Database miaraka amin'ny kilasy `DataBase`  
- Fandraisana fiovam-po (`convert_file`)  

### üõ†Ô∏è Fitaovana mpamorona
- System System (`Switch`, `AsyncSwitch`)  
- Syntax mandinika (`check_syntax`, `PythonFileChecker`)  
- Ny hadisoana manankarena dia mitatitra (multi-language)  
- rafitra fanampiana an-tsehatra mitambatra (`help`)  

### üåç IREMALIA
- 100+ natsangana-teny  
- Load Custom Translations  
- Fiteny runtime mifamadika (`set_language() `)  
- Automatic English fallback  

---

## Dependencies (handled automatically):

- pandas, numpy (data manipulation)

- matplotlib, seaborn (visualization)

- scikit-learn (statistics)

- sqlalchemy (database)

- geopandas (spatial data)

---

## üîß Usage Examples

### Set language 

**support for up to 131 languages** 
```_14_ ``


### statistika fototra
```python
import helper as hp

data = [1, 2, 2, 3, 4, 5]

print(hp.get_media(data))   # Mean
print(hp.get_median(data))  # Median
print(hp.get_moda(data))    # Mode
```

### Visualization
```python
import helper as hp

df = hp.pd.DataFrame({"values": [5, 3, 7, 2, 9]})
hp.histo(df, "values", bins=5, title="Sample Histogram")
```

### Fanaterana rakitra
```python
from helper import call

data = call(name="my_data", type="csv")  # Finds and loads a CSV file automatically
```

### CUAGLE FIVORIANA
```python
from helper import load_user_translations

# Load custom translations from lang.json
load_user_translations("custom/lang.json")
```

### Fanamarinana syntax
```python
from helper import run

run("./path/to/my_script.py")
#Show gui pop up with results
```

---

## üìÇ rafitry ny tetikasa

```
helper/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ core.py
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ __init__.py
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ lang/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ en.json
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ es.json
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ ... (100+ files)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ submodules/
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ graph.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ statics.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ utils.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ caller.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ checker.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ manager.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ pyswitch.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ shared.py
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ DBManager.py
```

## üîÆ Roadmap

- Karazana fahitana fanampiny

- Fanohanana ny angona fanitarana (NoSQL, graph databases)

- Fampidirana ny fianarana milina

- Interface mifototra amin'ny tranokala

- rafitra plugin

---

‚ö° Vonona ny hanohana ny workflows Python miaraka amin'ny ** pyhelper ** ? Atombohy ny fikarohana anio!
